para.para: Getting Started with vFabric GemFire provides step-by-step procedures for initial installation and configuration of VMware vFabric™ GemFire®. Tutorials and examples demonstrate product features; a documentation roadmap summarizes each main part of the User's Guide; and a main features section describes key functionality. This document provides a spring data gemfire version of all of the helloworld, tutorial, examples and quickstart samples found in the vFabric GemFire 6.6 documentation. Its purpose is to make spring-data-gemfire the preferred approach for dveloping GemFire applications when Spring is the preferred programming model of the development environment.
